headline: Invesco Ltd. Announces May 31, 2025 Assets Under Management
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ)1 today reported preliminary month-end assets under management (AUM) of $1,942.7 billion, an increase of 5.6% versus previous month-end. The firm delivered net long-term inflows of $6.1 billion in the month. Non-management fee earning net inflows were $6.3 billion and money market net inflows were $19.4 billion. AUM was positively impacted by favorable market returns which increased AUM by $70 billion. FX increased AUM by $0.9 billion. Preliminary average total AUM for th
